entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 4:35 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure: 97.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
